00046 /* Public Macros -------------------------------------------------------------- */
00051 /*********************************************************************/
00055 #define SSP_CPHA_FIRST                  ((uint32_t)(0))
00056 #define SSP_CPHA_SECOND                 SSP_CR0_CPHA_SECOND
00057 
00058 
00060 /* There's no bug here!!!
00061  * - If bit[6] in SSPnCR0 is 0: SSP controller maintains the bus clock low between frames.
00062  * That means the active clock is in HI state.
00063  * - If bit[6] in SSPnCR0 is 1 (SSP_CR0_CPOL_HI): SSP controller maintains the bus clock
00064  * high between frames. That means the active clock is in LO state.
00065  */
00066 #define SSP_CPOL_HI                             ((uint32_t)(0))
00067 #define SSP_CPOL_LO                             SSP_CR0_CPOL_HI
00068 
00070 #define SSP_SLAVE_MODE                  SSP_CR1_SLAVE_EN
00071 #define SSP_MASTER_MODE                 ((uint32_t)(0))
00072 
00074 #define SSP_DATABIT_4           SSP_CR0_DSS(4)                  
00075 #define SSP_DATABIT_5           SSP_CR0_DSS(5)                  
00076 #define SSP_DATABIT_6           SSP_CR0_DSS(6)                  
00077 #define SSP_DATABIT_7           SSP_CR0_DSS(7)                  
00078 #define SSP_DATABIT_8           SSP_CR0_DSS(8)                  
00079 #define SSP_DATABIT_9           SSP_CR0_DSS(9)                  
00080 #define SSP_DATABIT_10          SSP_CR0_DSS(10)                 
00081 #define SSP_DATABIT_11          SSP_CR0_DSS(11)                 
00082 #define SSP_DATABIT_12          SSP_CR0_DSS(12)

00166 #define SSP_STAT_ERROR          (1UL<<9)

00178 /*********************************************************************/
00182 #define SSP_CR0_DSS(n)                  ((uint32_t)((n-1)&0xF))
00183 
00184 #define SSP_CR0_FRF_SPI                 ((uint32_t)(0<<4))
00185 
00186 #define SSP_CR0_FRF_TI                  ((uint32_t)(1<<4))
00187 
00188 #define SSP_CR0_FRF_MICROWIRE   ((uint32_t)(2<<4))
00189 
00191 #define SSP_CR0_CPOL_HI         ((uint32_t)(1<<6))
00192 
00194 #define SSP_CR0_CPHA_SECOND     ((uint32_t)(1<<7))
00195 
00197 #define SSP_CR0_SCR(n)          ((uint32_t)((n&0xFF)<<8))
00198 
00199 #define SSP_CR0_BITMASK         ((uint32_t)(0xFFFF))
00200 
00201 /*********************************************************************/
00205 #define SSP_CR1_LBM_EN          ((uint32_t)(1<<0))
00206

00208 
00209 #define SSP_CR1_SLAVE_EN        ((uint32_t)(1<<2))
00210 
00212 #define SSP_CR1_SO_DISABLE      ((uint32_t)(1<<3))
00213 
00214 #define SSP_CR1_BITMASK         ((uint32_t)(0x0F))
00215 
00216 /*********************************************************************/
00220 #define SSP_DR_BITMASK(n)   ((n)&0xFFFF)
00221

00227

00311 /* ---------------- CHECK PARAMETER DEFINITIONS ---------------------------- */
00313 #define PARAM_SSPx(n)   ((((uint32_t *)n)==((uint32_t *)LPC_SSP0)) \
00314 || (((uint32_t *)n)==((uint32_t *)LPC_SSP1)))
00315 
00317 #define PARAM_SSP_CPHA(n)               ((n==SSP_CPHA_FIRST) || (n==SSP_CPHA_SECOND))
00318 
00320 #define PARAM_SSP_CPOL(n)               ((n==SSP_CPOL_HI) || (n==SSP_CPOL_LO))
00321 
00322 /* Macro check master/slave mode */
00323 #define PARAM_SSP_MODE(n)               ((n==SSP_SLAVE_MODE) || (n==SSP_MASTER_MODE))
00324 
00325 /* Macro check databit value */
00326 #define PARAM_SSP_DATABIT(n)    ((n==SSP_DATABIT_4) || (n==SSP_DATABIT_5) \
00327 || (n==SSP_DATABIT_6) || (n==SSP_DATABIT_16) \
00328 || (n==SSP_DATABIT_7) || (n==SSP_DATABIT_8) \
00329 || (n==SSP_DATABIT_9) || (n==SSP_DATABIT_10) \
00330 || (n==SSP_DATABIT_11) || (n==SSP_DATABIT_12) \
00331 || (n==SSP_DATABIT_13) || (n==SSP_DATABIT_14) \
00332 || (n==SSP_DATABIT_15))
00333 
00334 /* Macro check frame type */
00335 #define PARAM_SSP_FRAME(n) ((n==SSP_FRAME_SPI) || (n==SSP_FRAME_TI)\
00336 || (n==SSP_FRAME_MICROWIRE))
00337 
00338 /* Macro check SSP status */
00339 #define PARAM_SSP_STAT(n) ((n==SSP_STAT_TXFIFO_EMPTY) || (n==SSP_STAT_TXFIFO_NOTFULL) \
00340 || (n==SSP_STAT_RXFIFO_NOTEMPTY) || (n==SSP_STAT_RXFIFO_FULL) \
00341 || (n==SSP_STAT_BUSY))
00342 
00343 /* Macro check interrupt configuration */
00344 #define PARAM_SSP_INTCFG(n)     ((n==SSP_INTCFG_ROR) || (n==SSP_INTCFG_RT) \
00345 || (n==SSP_INTCFG_RX) || (n==SSP_INTCFG_TX))
00346 
00347 /* Macro check interrupt status value */
00348 #define PARAM_SSP_INTSTAT(n) ((n==SSP_INTSTAT_ROR) || (n==SSP_INTSTAT_RT) \
00349 || (n==SSP_INTSTAT_RX) || (n==SSP_INTSTAT_TX))
00350 
00351 /* Macro check interrupt status raw value */
00352 #define PARAM_SSP_INTSTAT_RAW(n)        ((n==SSP_INTSTAT_RAW_ROR) || (n==SSP_INTSTAT_RAW_RT) \
00353 || (n==SSP_INTSTAT_RAW_RX) || (n==SSP_INTSTAT_RAW_TX))
00354 
00355 /* Macro check interrupt clear mode */
00356 #define PARAM_SSP_INTCLR(n)     ((n==SSP_INTCLR_ROR) || (n==SSP_INTCLR_RT))
00357 
00358 /* Macro check DMA mode */
00359 #define PARAM_SSP_DMA(n)        ((n==SSP_DMA_TX) || (n==SSP_DMA_RX))

00365 /* Public Types --------------------------------------------------------------- */
00371 typedef struct {
00372         uint32_t Databit;               
00374         uint32_t CPHA;                  
00377         uint32_t CPOL;                  
00380         uint32_t Mode;                  
00383         uint32_t FrameFormat;   
00387         uint32_t ClockRate;             
00388 } SSP_CFG_Type;
00389 
00393 typedef enum {
00394         SSP_TRANSFER_POLLING = 0,       
00395         SSP_TRANSFER_INTERRUPT          
00396 } SSP_TRANSFER_Type;
00397 
00401 typedef struct {
00402         void *tx_data;                          
00403         uint32_t tx_cnt;                        
00404         void *rx_data;                          
00405         uint32_t rx_cnt;                        
00406         uint32_t length;                        
00407         uint32_t status;                        
00408 } SSP_DATA_SETUP_Type;
